AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Just over 3 years as a developer, My skills include (Angular, iONIC, REST API, Nodejs, jQuery, JavaScript, TypeScript, NextJs, CSS3, HTML5...etc), ) I have expertise in maintaining websites and web applications, in addition to working with libraries such as React and Bootstrap.
I am focused on delivering highperformance solutions to meet market demands.
